import React, { userState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Icon, Menu, Table } from "semantic-ui-react"; import ProductService from "../services/productService"; export default function ProductList() { const [products, setProducts] = userState([]); // Sayfa yüklediğinde yapılması gereken userEffect(() => { let productService = new ProductService(); productService.getProucts().then(result => setProducts(result.data.data)) }) return (
Ürün Adı Birim Fiyat Stok Adedi Açıklama Kategori {products.map((product) => ( {product.productName} {product.unitPrice} {product.unitsInStock} {product.quantityPerUnit} {product.category.categoryName} ))} 1 2 3 4
); }
